data.title: Acid Row & Madhouse Express
data.meta_description:
Event Horizon by Acid Row & Madhouse Express, released 13 January 2023

I’ve cruised by
From the past
Infinite rise
Into the dark
I’ve seen light
Light moves on
To horizon
Bending in
Facing faith
On time row
Rowing back
Back to now
Now will pass
The horizon
Voiding in
Voiding out
Voiding in 
Event horizon
We’re getting nowhere
But so close
We’re getting somewhere
We are the time 
I’ve been thrown
Thrown and gone
Gone too far
Far behind
Far beyond
Behind beyond
The horizon
Voiding in
Voiding out
Voiding in 
Event horizon
We’re getting nowhere
But so close
We’re getting somewhere
We are the space
Endless night 
Endless dawn 
Shifting on 
With space 
Stretching in 
Shrinking out
Spaghettified into verse
Time flies 
So strange
Here it swaps with space
Stretching in reverse
Spaghettified into verse
Descending into chaotic supermassive ceasing of being               
Into all consuming God’s Eye 
That sees but can’t be seen
The cosmic clock is ticking slowly
And I am cosmically crucified
Descending into chaos
Supermassive and lost 
All consuming dead eye
That sees but cant be seen
Clock is ticking 
Cosmic crucifixion
Outside world continues to spin, your body lays still
Say hello to cosmos
Say hello to other side
The clock has stopped
With no time there is no light
With no light there is no night
With no night there is no name
With no name there is no might
I am fading matter trapped in haze
I am warping in a limbo
I am last in space
Dissolved into madness
It takes only a step now
Now starts eternal return
The clock goes on
